file_content.text: Thanks for retrieving those plans for us. I think you made Agent Nianla crack a smile.
Please, hurry. Those walker plans are critical to the war effort.
You're one of the Sith, aren't you? Please, I need someone with high security clearance for a vital retrieval mission.
Excuse me, what's your clearance? I need someone for a retrieval mission. It's a matter of Imperial security.
The Republic raided one of our research posts--a ship escaped with stolen plans for a brand-new walker design. Luckily, our gunners just brought the ship down.
I need someone--someone trustworthy--to check the crash site and retrieve those plans.
We Sith know the value of discretion.
I'm trustworthy.
Without going into details, I probably have a higher clearance than you.
I can be trusted.
Oh. I see. Seems I picked the right person to ask.
In my line of work, you soon learn how to keep secrets.
I'm very discreet.
Oh good, good. Intelligence is up in arms over this.
Perhaps. Convince me.
Intelligence is providing a reward for the plans' recovery.
This is the route to the crash site--oh, if there are any survivors, kill on sight.
Take the plans to Agent Nianla. She'll get them to safety. Thanks--it was a stroke of luck meeting you.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Oh. Sorry to have troubled you, I'll get someone else to investigate.
Sorry, I really need someone with a better security clearance.
